description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension, chimney removal and installation of 3 no. front roof lights
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please provide copies of all existing elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.Note: We received proposed floor plans, proposed roof plan and proposed elevations. We also require existing ground floor plan, exisitng roof plan and existing elevations.
